university_name: Cornell University - College of Agriculture & Life Sciences (CALS)
module_restrictions: Cornell cannot guarantee enrollment in any course. Course availability cannot be guaranteed and course offerings are always subject to change. Some courses require prerequisites.
visa_info: All students are advised to apply for the necessary visa immediately after they receive the official offer letter/email from their host university. Some visa application processes can take up to 2 months to process.
accommodations_info: In recent years, Cornell has experienced an increased demand for on-campus housing, and as a result, on-campus housing is not usually available for incoming exchange students. Exchange students should refer to the resources provided by Cornell for housing options, including cooperative housing and off-campus housing. Cornell also has an exchange housing program to assist students in finding suitable accommodations.
cost_of_living: The estimated monthly living expenses can be found on Cornell's financial aid website. Tuition fees are waived for exchange students.
